description: This file provides a set of API functions (apiGet, apiPost, apiPut, apiDelete) for making HTTP requests to a backend, utilizing a base URL configured via environment variables. It serves as a wrapper around fetch implementing standard CRUD operations with error handling.

methods.name: export async function apiGet<T>(path: string, init?: RequestInit): Promise<T> { apiGet
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the API base URL concatenated with the specified path, returning the parsed JSON response as type T.

methods.name: export async function apiPost<T>(path: string, body?: unknown, init?: RequestInit): Promise<T> { apiPost
methods.description: Performs a POST request with optional JSON body to the API base URL + path and returns the parsed JSON response as type T.

methods.name: export async function apiPut<T>(path: string, body?: unknown, init?: RequestInit): Promise<T> { apiPut
methods.description: Performs a PUT request with optional JSON body to the API base URL + path and returns the parsed JSON response as type T.

methods.name: export async function apiDelete<T>(path: string, init?: RequestInit): Promise<T> { apiDelete
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the API base URL + path and returns the parsed JSON response as type T.

ctags.name: apiDelete
